synopsis.text: Maria Kurose's arrival and the malicious rumors about Runa put Ryuuto Kashima's newfound relationship to the test. Initially a gloomy social outcast, Ryuuto finds himself in an unexpected romance with Runa Shirakawa, the most popular girl in school. Their connection begins when Ryuuto, after losing a game, must ask Runa out, and to his surprise, she accepts. Despite their contrasting social circles and interests, they start to appreciate their differences and form a bond. However, Ryuuto's middle school crush, Maria, transfers to their class, causing complications. As Ryuuto navigates this complex situation and confronts his past insecurities, he becomes determined to protect Runa from the harmful gossip circulating around the school. Will their unique bond withstand these challenges, or will it crumble under the pressure? Only time will reveal the fate of their blossoming love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
